contact_header: For any special requests, please send me an email via this form. Please note that only one email per address will be processed, so make sure not to forget anything !
contact_name_tooshort: Your name must atleast contain 2 letters
contact_name_nonumber: Your firstname must not contain numbers
contact_lastname_tooshort: Your lastname must atleast contain 2 letters
contact_lastname_nonumber: Your lastname must not contain numbers
contact_email_error: This email format is not valid.
contact_button_error: You already sent us a mail with this address
